original_text: Then it continued west to the sea, with Micmethath on the north side of the border. East of Micmethath, the border went past Taanath Shiloh on the east and then to Janoah.
korean_text: 또 서쪽으로 나아가 북쪽 믹므다에 이르고 동쪽으로 돌아 다아낫 실로에 이르러 야노아 동쪽을 지나고

sentences.original_text: Then it continued west to the sea
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 서쪽으로 계속 이어져 바다에 이르렀습니다

sentences.original_text: with Micmethath on the north side of the border
the border went past Taanath Shiloh on the east
